verbs.description: [V: hate] [ARG1: waiting in line here where to eat in sf] instead if you 're like me you love good food but hate waiting in line for it we 've rounded up alternatives to some of san francisco most popular restaurants cafes and bakeries for the days where you just ca n't stand the thought of waiting in line you can have it both ways apple sfgate hamilton san francisco san franciscans bart
